attributes.action: Require that all new monies are to be created as credit and are not to be paid back and that the free market should determine the level of interest rates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To slowly raise the short-term borrowing rate until it is profitable for other entities to lend money at that rate and allow the Bank of England to generate new money which is given to individuals, corporations, charities and government.
